title: JavaScript Step by Step (3rd Ed)(gnv64)

Your hands-on guide to JavaScript fundamentals
Expand your expertiseÃ¢â‚¬â€and teach yourself the fundamentals of JavaScript. If you have previous programming experience but are new to JavaScript, this tutorial delivers the step-by-step guidance and coding exercises you need to master core topics and techniques.

Discover how to:
-    Work with JavaScript syntax, variables, and data types
-    Master techniques for building cross-browser programs
-    Speed up and simplify app development with jQuery
-    Quickly retrieve data from a server using AJAX requests
-    Adapt your app for mobile devices with jQuery Mobile
-    Build Windows 8 apps using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript 

About the Author
Steve Suehring is a technology architect whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s written about programming, security, network and system administration, operating systems, and other topics for several industry publications. He is also the author of Start Here!Ã¢â€žÂ¢ Learn JavaScript, which is designed for those with no previous programming experience.
